original_title: American Steam: Vol. 2: Twilight of Steam
overview: Through the 16mm camera of Bill McClellan you'll see steam from the 60's & early '70's. Most of these locomotives are either still active or available for viewing in various parts of the country. You'll see 4-6-2 Canadian Pacific #127, 2-10-0 Strasburg #90, 0-6-0 Conway Scenic Railroad #47, 2-8-0 Morris County Central #385, 2-8-0 #382 and 0-6-0 #4039, 4-8-4 Reading 2100 and 2102 double headed, Reading 4-8-4 in Delaware & Hudson style, Canadian National 4-8-4 #6218, Canadian Pacific 4-6-4T #47, and the Steamtown 2-6-0 #89.
title: American Steam: Vol. 2: Twilight of Steam
